an8.78:1.1: Tatra kho ayasma sariputto bhikkhu amantesi …pe…
an8.78:1.2: chahavuso, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam attano, alam paresam.
an8.78:1.4: Idhavuso, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:1.8: kalyanavaco ca hoti kalyanavakkarano, poriya vacaya samannagato vissatthaya anelagalaya atthassa vinnapaniya;
an8.78:1.9: sandassako ca hoti samadapako samuttejako sampahamsako sabrahmacarinam.
an8.78:1.10: Imehi kho, avuso, chahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam attano, alam paresam.
an8.78:2.1: Pancahavuso, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam attano, alam paresam.
an8.78:2.3: Idhavuso, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:2.9: Imehi kho, avuso, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam attano, alam paresam.
an8.78:3.1: Catuhavuso, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam attano, nalam paresam.
an8.78:3.3: Idhavuso, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:3.9: Imehi kho, avuso, catuhi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam attano, nalam paresam.
an8.78:4.1: Catuhavuso, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam paresam, nalam attano.
an8.78:4.3: Idhavuso, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:4.5: no ca dhatanam dhammanam atthupaparikkhita hoti;
an8.78:4.6: no ca atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammappatipanno hoti;
an8.78:4.9: Imehi kho, avuso, catuhi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam paresam, nalam attano.
an8.78:5.1: Tihavuso, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam attano, nalam paresam.
an8.78:5.3: Idhavuso, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:5.9: Imehi kho, avuso, tihi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam attano, nalam paresam.
an8.78:6.1: Tihavuso, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam paresam, nalam attano.
an8.78:6.3: Idhavuso, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:6.5: no ca dhatanam dhammanam atthupaparikkhita hoti;
an8.78:6.6: no ca atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammappatipanno hoti;
an8.78:6.9: Imehi kho, avuso, tihi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam paresam, nalam attano.
an8.78:7.1: Dvihavuso, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam attano, nalam paresam.
an8.78:7.3: Idhavuso, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:7.4: no ca sutanam dhammanam dharanajatiko hoti;
an8.78:7.9: Imehi kho, avuso, dvihi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam attano, nalam paresam.
an8.78:8.1: Dvihavuso, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam paresam, nalam attano.
an8.78:8.3: Idhavuso, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.78:8.4: no ca sutanam dhammanam dharanajatiko hoti;
an8.78:8.5: no ca dhatanam dhammanam atthupaparikkhita hoti;
an8.78:8.6: no ca atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammappatipanno hoti;
an8.78:8.7: kalyanavaco ca hoti kalyanavakkarano, poriya vacaya samannagato vissatthaya anelagalaya atthassa vinnapaniya;
an8.78:8.8: sandassako ca hoti samadapako samuttejako sampahamsako sabrahmacarinam.
an8.78:8.9: Imehi kho, avuso, dvihi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam paresam, nalam attano”ti.
